TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowMenuCommands extends System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands
Public NotInheritable Class WorkflowMenuCommands Inherits StandardCommands

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定义一组 字段，其中每个字段都对应于工作流设计器提供的一个命令函数。

span.span: Defines a set of fields that each corresponds to a command function provided by the workflow designers.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 包含一组 字段，可用于在使用 的 方法添加命令时指定要链接的命令。 contains a set of fields that can be used to specify a command to link when adding a command using the method of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建自定义 。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom . 在此示例中，当调用 `ShowContextMenu` 时会创建一个上下文菜单。In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called. 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，使用 类将工作流设计器提供的适当菜单命令与其对应文本相关联。In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text. 此操作完成后，将一个事件处理程序与每个命令相关联，以便在选择该命令时，调用相应的 `MenuCommand`。When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要启用此服务，请调用 `AddService` 类中 属性的 方法，如下面的示例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#31)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#31)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建自定义 。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom . 在此示例中，当调用 `ShowContextMenu` 时会创建一个上下文菜单。In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called. 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，使用 类将工作流设计器提供的适当菜单命令与其对应文本相关联。In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text. 此操作完成后，将一个事件处理程序与每个命令相关联，以便在选择该命令时，调用相应的 `MenuCommand`。When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要启用此服务，请调用 `AddService` 类中 属性的 方法，如下面的示例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#31)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#31)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID BreakpointActionMenu
Public Shared ReadOnly BreakpointActionMenu As CommandID

span.span: Gets the for the breakpoint action menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 断点操作菜单通常用于设置、移除或更改断点。The breakpoint action menu is typically used to set, remove, or change breakpoints.

Public Shared ReadOnly Collapse As CommandID

summary.span: 可用于访问折叠菜单的 。

span.span: A that can be used to access the collapse menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 折叠菜单通常用于折叠复合活动。The collapse menu is typically used to collapse composite activities. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建自定义 。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom . 在此示例中，当调用 `ShowContextMenu` 时会创建一个上下文菜单。In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called. 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，使用 类将工作流设计器提供的适当菜单命令与其对应文本相关联。In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text. 此操作完成后，将一个事件处理程序与每个命令相关联，以便在选择该命令时，调用相应的 `MenuCommand`。When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要启用此服务，请调用 `AddService` 类中 属性的 方法，如下面的示例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#31)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#31)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 禁用菜单通常禁用工作流上的活动。The disable menu typically disables an activity on a workflow. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建自定义 。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom . 在此示例中，当调用 `ShowContextMenu` 时会创建一个上下文菜单。In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called. 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，使用 类将工作流设计器提供的适当菜单命令与其对应文本相关联。In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text. 此操作完成后，将一个事件处理程序与每个命令相关联，以便在选择该命令时，调用相应的 `MenuCommand`。When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要启用此服务，请调用 `AddService` 类中 属性的 方法，如下面的示例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要启用此服务，请调用 `AddService` 类中 属性的 方法，如下面的示例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. This field is read-only.

This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 平移菜单通常用于滚动工作流的可见区域。The pan menu is typically used to scroll the visible area of the workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打印菜单通常用于打印工作流。The print menu is typically used to print the workflow.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID RunToCursorMenu
Public Shared ReadOnly RunToCursorMenu As CommandID

summary.span: 可用于访问运行到光标处菜单的 。

span.span: A that can be used to access the run to cursor menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运行到光标处菜单通常用于将断点放置在工作流中的光标位置处并恢复执行，直到到达该断点为止。The run to cursor menu is typically used to place a breakpoint in the workflow at the location of the cursor and resume execution until that breakpoint is reached.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID SaveAsImage
Public Shared ReadOnly SaveAsImage As CommandID

summary.span: 可用于访问另存为图像菜单的 。

span.span: A that can be used to access the save as image menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 另存为图像菜单将工作流另存为图像。The save as image menu saves the workflow as an image.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID SelectionMenu
Public Shared ReadOnly SelectionMenu As CommandID

summary.span: 可用于访问选择菜单的 。

span.span: A that can be used to access the selection menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选择菜单通常用于管理工作流中的选择。The selection menu is typically used to manage a selection within the workflow. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建自定义 。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom . 在此示例中，当调用 `ShowContextMenu` 时会创建一个上下文菜单。In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called. 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，使用 类将工作流设计器提供的适当菜单命令与其对应文本相关联。In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text. 此操作完成后，将一个事件处理程序与每个命令相关联，以便在选择该命令时，调用相应的 `MenuCommand`。When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要启用此服务，请调用 `AddService` 类中 属性的 方法，如下面的示例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#31)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#31)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示下一语句菜单通常用于突出显示在逐句执行工作流时要执行的下一条语句。The show next statement menu is typically used to highlight the next statement to be executed while stepping through the execution of a workflow.
